label: A2B_tP12_92_b_a-002
title: Paratellurite ($\alpha$TeO$_{2}$) Structure
comments:
TeO$_{2}$ has been observed in three different forms (Ceriotti, 2006; Liu, 2016): \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP12_92_b_a-002}{$\alpha$-TeO$_{2}$, paratellurite} (this structure) is the ground state \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP24_61_2c_c-002}{$\beta$-TeO$_{2}$, tellurite} is stable under ambient conditions and is the most commonly observed phase \item $\gamma$-TeO$_{2}$ is metastable, and forms at 663K in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_19_2a_a-002}{$\beta$-SnF$_{2}$} structure. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP12_92_b_a-002}{Paratellurite} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP12_92_b_a-001}{$\alpha$-cristobalite ($C30$)} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A2B\_tP12\_92\_b\_a. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
